text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]A = \left[ \begin{array}{cc} 1 & 2 \\ 2 & 5 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline]. By row-reducing [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline], answer the question, is [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] invertible?

font.p: [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] row reduces to the identity matrix, so it is invertible.
